body.p:
Smithland Aug. 24th 61
His Excellency B. Magoffin
Dr Sir
There has been in the court for Larceny a conviction of one James Carroll

His case is one of peculiar character. The testimony against him was that of an accomplice considering this fact together with the further fact. that upon the trial he a most excellenct charcter & being but a young man I would be glad if consistent with your opinion that you would interpose your executive clemency

I remain with highest regards
Yours. &c
L. M. Lowe
